name: Phineas and Ferb Across the 2nd Dimension
synopsis: If you want a different experience, try the version of Phineas and Ferb Across the 2nd Dimension for Nintendo DS. You can play with Phineas, Ferb or Agent P, through five worlds and 30 action-packed levels. Along the way, you'll need to build and upgrade your weapons, like the Baseball Launcher or Agent P's favorite weapon, the Hitch Gun.
